code: import{useEffect}from"react";import{useLocation,useNavigationType}from"react-router-dom";var ScrollToTop=function ScrollToTop(){var location=useLocation();var navigationType=useNavigationType();useEffect(function(){if(navigationType==='PUSH'&&!location.hash){window.scrollTo(0,0);}},[navigationType,location]);return null;};export default ScrollToTop;
